#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,sum,z1,z2,d,z;
	string str1,str2,ch;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		cin>>str1;
		cin>>str2;
		cin>>d;
	
	z1=str1.length();
	z2=str2.length();
	map<char,int>a1;
	map<char,int>a2;
	for(i=0;i<z1;i++)
	{
		a1[str1[i]]++;
	}
	for(i=0;i<z2;i++)
	{
		a2[str2[i]]++;
	}
	ch="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
	for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	{
		z=(a1[ch[i]]-a2[ch[i]]);
		if(z<0)
		z*=-1;
		sum+=z;
	}
	if(sum<=d)
	cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
